overview:
Prior to founding Olery Kim was a consultant at one of the worlds leading recruitment consultancies, Robert Walters where she was an intermediaire between companies and legal counsels and lawyers searching for new challenges. Prior to Robert Walters, Kim was a lawyer herself at a top notch law firm, Van Benthem & Keulen. She played a vital role as a bankruptcy lawyer in many cases varying from local entrepreneurs going bankrupt to multi-nationals seeking legal advise on how to deal with moratorium.

Kim holds a Masters Degree in Law from the VU University in Amsterdam in The Netherlands. During her study she was an exchange student at McGill University in Montreal, Canada where she received an Awards of Excellence for her achievements.
